about: I am a young woman of colour that has taken on the journey to becoming one of the best front-end web developers in the industry.Despite the challenges of the tech industry, I am determined to make a success out my experience at Life Choices as a Web Developments student.  I have gained the fundamental skills and experince in HTML, CSS and JavaScript and I am looking forward to learning much more!The technology industry has grown tremendously, and continues to do so. I am determined to consisently evolve and strengthen my skills. My passion and daring personality makes me stand out!
I am passionate about upskillment of self.
